data.title: From Katrina Kaif In Rajasthan To Orry In Goa; Celebs Ring In 2024 At These Tourist Spots
data.meta_description: From Katrina Kaif travelling in Rajasthan to Kareena Kapoor Khan enjoying a holiday in Switzerland, here's how celebs welcomed the New Year.
data.text:
Wishing all of you a grand 2024 and the best wishes to kickstart the best year of your life, hopefully! The 3-day long weekend comes to an end with all of us rushing back to normal lives. But before we move forward with our day-to-day tasks, let us acknowledge how beautifully most of us spent the first day of the year. Our beloved celebs too enjoyed the last couple of days in the grandest way possible, with friends and family. We loved watching all the fun sneak peeks of their merriment and there are loads of glimpses and snippets for you as well.

Let’s Take A Into Our Favourite Celebs’ New Year Celebrations

1. Alia Bhatt

What better than welcoming a new year than with family and loved ones? With husband Ranbir Kapoor and daughter Raha Kapoor, the actor spent a wonderful family time amidst the serenity of lush nature and water all around. According to reports surfacing online, the Bhatt-Kapoors enjoyed a beautiful beginning in the Maldives.

2. Katrina Kaif

Imagine spending a winter holiday in the middle of a desert surrounded by sand dunes and your bae. Looks like a perfect escape, right? Well, Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal’s new year looked a lot similar to this serene imagination. From exploring verdant greenery to enjoying a bonfire at night, VicKat welcomed 2024 holidaying in Rajasthan.

3. Vicky Kaushal

Vicky shared a beautiful candid shot from their winter vacation in Rajasthan. With lanterns decorating the place, it looks absolutely breathtaking.

Also read: Video Of Ranbir Kapoor Lighting Chocolate Whiskey Flambe Cake Goes Viral; Here’s Its Recipe

4. Deepika Padukone

Deepika welcomed 2024 spending a magical 1st day of the 366 days. From enjoying a picturesque sunrise to spending the first day of the year on nature’s lap, the actor began her new year taking a trip to an undisclosed destination.

5. Dua Lipa

It has been some days since Dua Lipa and her family are holidaying in Rajasthan. The Lipa family flew to Jaipur to celebrate the last holiday season of 2023 and kickstart 2024. From enjoying a luxurious holiday to witnessing the rich glory of Jaipur, they are surely having an incredible time in India.

6. Parineeta Chopra

Parineeti’s Christmas and NYE celebrations were all about creating memories with her husband and loved ones. From visiting beautiful places to relishing loads of yum food to eating chocolate in bed, the actor had a great time in Austria.

7. Kiara Advani & Sidharth Malhotra

Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra rang in the New Year in the most spectacular way possible. Taking a trip to a stunning snow-clad destination, they shared glimpses of their holidays from unending views of snow-covered mountains and peaks. Looks like their romantic vacation and New Year celebrations also included some adventurous activities amid the breathtaking snowy surroundings.

Also read: From Sara Ali Khan To Shehnaaz Gill, These Bolly Celebs Recently Visited Badrinath & Kedarnath Dham

8. Athiya Shetty

Athiya Shetty celebrated this special moment with her special someone, her husband KL Rahul. She shared a beautiful picture from an aesthetically lit place with a vibrant ‘KISS ME’ neon letter light in the background.

9. Shahid Kapoor & Mira Rajput Kapoor

The Rajputs and Kapoors took a beautiful trip to explore Bhutan’s impressive serenity and picturesque landscapes. With parents, brother, and kids, Shahid and Mira welcomed 2024 while being surrounded by the most special people of their lives.

10. Preity Zinta

Preity welcomed 2024 by partying and having a great time with her husband. The couple had a rocking start to the year witnessing grand fireworks displays, dancing, walking with the crowd, and celebrating with a lot of fun.

11. Kareena Kapoor Khan

We are in love with Kareena and Saif’s winter holiday to Switzerland. This beautiful destination is special to the couple and they often fly there to enjoy the perfect family time.

12. Mouni Roy

Mouni’s 1st day of 2024 was all about spending it with her husband Suraj Nambiar, drinking coffee, swimming, eating delish food, reading, and having an amazing time in Dubai.

13. Orry

Orry is surely living the dream life! He spent the holiday season enjoying a splendid time and partying in Goa. Surrounded by his friends and loved ones, he spent the last day of 2023 with a lavish celebration.

14. Tejasswi Prakash

Tejasswi and Karan welcomed 2024 with friends and loved ones. From taking a road trip to enjoying the night with loved ones, TV’s favourite couple surely had a great time.

Also read: Tejasswi Prakash’s Father Still Thinks Acting Is Her Hobby, Wants Her To Pursue Masters | Curly Tales

15. Aly Goni & Jasmine Bhasin

Aly and Jasmine welcomed 2024 in literal paradise, Kashmir. The couple shared glimpses from their vacation in the winter wonderland and we cannot take our eyes off the scenic surroundings.

16. Karan Wahi

Karan Wahi’s first day of the year was a lot of fun and was about creating core memories with his friends and loved ones. A group of 6 adults worked hard to win a prize for a 2-year-old baby and we can already imagine how fun it must have been.

All the celebs enjoyed a spectacular beginning to 2024. How did you spend the New Year?

Also, are these picturesque vacations of celebs influencing you to travel more in 2024?

Cover Image Courtesy: Instagram/ Katrina Kaif (@katrinakaif), Instagram/ Orhan Awatramani (@orry1)
